about_the_game:
Use Capri's gravity manipulation to slingshot across the universe as she embarks on a mission to liberate a forgotten dimension from the clutches of an all-powerful being. Solve puzzles, uncover mysteries, and shatter space-time itself in this snappy sci-fi action platformer.

What lies in the dimensions above our own?


  • An original sci-fi narrative set in the far reaches of the universe following Capri's fight to right cosmic wrongs and save PROJECT: Almagest.
  • High-speed movement is interwoven with unique puzzle mechanics sure to engage hypothalamuses and prefrontal cortexes alike.
  • Galaxy distribution across the universe is dynamic and infinite. Stay conscious, or be lost in the infinite aether.
  • On The Brink has subtitles available alongside controller support for both Windows and Mac OSX.
  • Recommended for third-dimensional beings. Playable in the second dimension, with decreased performance.
